Text: Hello retora , thank you so much for fantastic analog masters, first time in many years, I can listen to my favorite Elvis albums in their original sound . Appreciate your work !
thank you so much great sound sorry that its your last ,TCB

BY 1000 time THANK, thank, thank.... 
YOU ARE  SIMPLY THE GREATEST...
PLEASE DON'T STOP....
ONE MORE FOR MY COLLECTION PLEASE....
thank you retroa. another one to help spread the great music Elvis left us!

I guess I'll download this one next! Can't wait to hear And I Love You So!
I think a lot of people do not leave comments because most people do not log in, and pirate bay will not let you comment unless you log in. But I am sure everyone is very grateful and blown away by the fantastic sound quality!! If I got to make a request, it would be the song "Wonderful World" just because there is a lot going on in that song and it needs to be separated to sound clean, the way your masters do. I'd love to hear the Double Trouble, Roustabout and Clambake soundtracks too! I love the song "There's So much World To See", probably because of the strings. It's too bad they cut a verse out ( FTD put it out. )
Anyway, these are awesome! Love them all!! Thank you!!!
